instruction: Create a fantasy story about an adventure in a cave.
output:
It was a typical day in the kingdom until an old man stumbled into town babbling about a secret cave with untold wonders. The kingdom was skeptical, but curiosity won out and a group of brave adventurers were sent to find the mysterious cave. After days of searching, they stumbled across a small entrance that lead to an underground labyrinth.

It was full of strange creatures, shimmering crystals and hidden treasures. The group soon realized why the old man had been so keen to share his secret - the cave was a magical realm, full of danger and mystery. Eventually, after a series of puzzles and perilous battles, the heroes managed to make it back to the entrance of the cave, richer and wiser from their journey.
